Dear Vibha,

 

Hope all is well.

 

Kindly note that the insurance renewal for the Group Liability insurance program is due for renewal on 24/09/2025 for which the premium is based on the generated sales figures.

 

Appreciate if you could provide the updated turnover figures for the group companies including JVs in the same format of the attached.

 

Please provide the budgeted figures for 2024 & 2025.

Also, kindly provide the actual turnover figures for FY 2024. I will use it to extrapolate a likely 2025 actual based on the same ratio of 2024 actual to 2024 budget. The purpose of the request is that the group liability insurance is priced based on the turnover for each entity based on the estimated TO and adjusted at the end of the policy period based on the actuals.

 

Appreciate if you could provide me with the requested details by next week if possible.

 

Thank you very much for your support.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop
